name: PercutaneousCoronaryInterventions
title: Percutaneous Coronary Interventions
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent patients who have undergone percutaneous coronary intervention.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) datatype related to Procedure, Performed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with codes to identify percutaneous coronary interventions.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
